publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4040 Tommy Sheridan: Illegal Bombardment of Iraq-That the Parliament believes that the American-led bombardment of Iraq is unjust, immoral and illegal and that Scottish and British troops should not be involved in this massacre.

S1M-4040 Tommy Sheridan: Illegal Bombardment of Iraq—That the Parliament believes that the American-led bombardment of Iraq is unjust, immoral and illegal and that Scottish and British troops should not be involved in this massacre.
